author: The Film Theorists
description:
*🪣💦 Subscribe to save Steve!* ► https://www.youtube.com/@FilmTheory/?sub_confirmation=1

Should Steve in the new Minecraft Movie ACTUALLY be dead? We take a closer look at a scene from one of the trailers to see if it's truly possible for them to survive the fall using the classic water bucket trick or if the movie made a fatal error.
